title: UTF-8 Basic Latin & Controls

metadata.description: Learn about UTF-8 Basic Latin & Controls with clear explanations and practical examples.

content_sections.title: UTF
content_sections.content:
-8 Basic Latin & Controls Hex 0000-007F / Decimal 0-127. This character set is the same as the original ASCII character set. If you want a special characters displayed in HTML, you can use the HTML entity found in the table below. If the character does not have an HTML entity, you can use the decimal (dec) or hexadecimal (hex) reference. Example

My name is Johnny "Bang" Johnson

My name is Johnny "Bang" Johnson

My name is Johnny "Bang" Johnson

Will display as: My name is Johnny "Bang" Johnson My name is Johnny "Bang" Johnson My name is Johnny "Bang" Johnson Char Dec Hex Entity Name 32 0020 SPACE ! 33 0021 EXCLAMATION MARK " 34 0022 " QUOTATION MARK # 35 0023 NUMBER SIGN $ 36 0024 DOLLAR SIGN % 37 0025 PERCENT SIGN & 38 0026 & AMPERSAND ' 39 0027 APOSTROPHE ( 40 0028 LEFT PARENTHESIS ) 41 0029 RIGHT PARENTHESIS * 42 002A ASTERISK + 43 002B PLUS SIGN , 44 002C

C0 Control Characters
These control characters (range 0-31, plus 127) were originally designed to control hardware devices.
Control characters (except horizontal tab, carriage return, and line feed) 
have nothing to do inside an HTML document.
Char
Dec
Hex
Description

null character

quiz.question: What is This character set?
options:
Johnny "Bang" Johnson

My name is Johnny "Bang" Johnson

My name is Johnny "Bang" Johnson

Will display as: My name is Johnny "Bang" Johnson My name is Johnny "Bang" Johnson My name is Johnny "Bang" Johnson Char Dec Hex Entity Name 32 0020 SPACE
the same as the original ASCII character set
quiz.explanation: The correct definition of This character set is 'the same as the original ASCII character set'.

quiz.explanation:
The correct definition of My name is 'Johnny "Bang" Johnson

My name is Johnny "Bang" Johnson

My name is Johnny "Bang" Johnson

summary: This tutorial covers UTF-8 Basic Latin & Controls concepts and techniques. You'll learn how to use UTF-8 Basic Latin & Controls effectively, including key principles, common patterns, and practical examples. By the end of this tutorial, you'll have a solid understanding of UTF-8 Basic Latin & Controls and how to apply it in your projects.
